diff_hunk:
@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@ string(REPLACE "-gencode;" "-gencode=" NVCC_GENCODE "${NVCC_GENCODE}")
 message(STATUS "Set NVCC_GENCODE for building NCCL: ${NVCC_GENCODE}")
 
 ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(
-   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
+   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nccl
body: Just to check - NVIDIA wasn't interested in having this `CMakeLists.txt` in their own repository? Just verifying, since it would be easiest if everything in `third_party/nccl` came from their submodule repository. But you likely know that :)
